/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural prowess of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the bustling cityscape. In the distance, a river can be seen, adding a touch of tranquility to the urban setting. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings. This image truly encapsulates the essence of Beijing, a city where tradition and modernity coexist.
